plot: Homer is worried that he is no longer the cool parent after Marge, Bart, and Lisa become foodies.

Marge takes Bart and Lisa on a weekend excursion, but when an unexpected restaurant detour in an Ethiopian neighborhood awakens their taste buds, fellow foodies Amuse Bruce and Fois Garth inspire them to start their own food blog, the Three Mouthketeers. They score an exclusive reservation at Springfield's premiere modern restaurant, but Marge has an unsettling dream during which Anthony Bourdain, Gordon Ramsay, and Mario Batali lead her to reconsider extending the invite to Homer. Later, Marge directs Homer to a different type of cooking lab, where he gets into a bind with law enforcement authorities.—Fox Publicity
